quests.name: Jira Ticket Research
quests.description: Fetches tickets assigned to the user from Jira, researches them in the codebase, and generates a getting started guide.
quests.instructions: Fetch all open tickets assigned to me. For each ticket, search the codebase for relevant files and generate a summary of how to start.

inputConfig.label: Ticket Filter (Optional)
inputConfig.description: Filter by Project Key (e.g. "SHA") or specific Ticket ID (e.g. "SHA-123")

quests.name: Hellofresh Registration (Staging US)
quests.description:
1. Navigate to https://www-staging.hellofresh.com/plans
2. Continue through the signup funnel, only selecting required information. If required to select something, choose randomly.
3. When you get to the page asking for email/login details, enter a new email in accordance with dynamic email rules, using 'password' as the password.
4. Enter random delivery address information, ignore validation unless it prevents you from progressing to the next step.
5. Enter credit card details in accordance with credit card details provided in the system prompt. Progress to next step, doing anything else required.
6. Once the account is created and there is some format of a 'welcome' message, this task is complete.
